doc.title: Broken/Perish
doc.plot: When a depressive young woman, Kab, hangs herself, she awakes along a creek bed just outside of town, where she is discovered by a roving gypsy. Unable to find happiness, she resorts again and again to suicide, but awakes again and again along the creek bed. With the help of her boyfriend, Path, and the gypsy, Jean, Kab tries to find a life of happiness. She will try to get it right.
